page.title: 06A TYPICAL CHILD'S DAY
page.content: I get up between 7 and half past.First I get dressed then I go down stairs to eat my beakfast.I brush my hair and teeth.I get my bag packed and put my coat on.After saying goodbye to my mum I go for my friends.At half 8 we all go to school where I go to the infants end and look after the little children till the bell rings.In the class room we all read our books while the teacher counts the number who want school dinners.Then we work till 11 o'clock that's when we have our playtime.Then we go back to the classroom and work till 12:30.I have school dinners.Then we go back to the classroom and work till 3:15.The bell rings and its home time.I walk home with my classmates.I do my homework and go out with my friends then at 6:00 I go in and have my dinner and wash the dishes.I go to bed at 9:00.
